## Description {#details}

This file defines the interface for the loop nest analysis.

<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if the given loops \\p OuterLoop and \\p InnerLoop are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// perfectly nested with respect to each other, and false otherwise.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   for(i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     for(j)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       for(k)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// arePerfectlyNested(loop&#95;i, loop&#95;j, SE) would return true.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// arePerfectlyNested(loop&#95;j, loop&#95;k, SE) would return true.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// arePerfectlyNested(loop&#95;i, loop&#95;k, SE) would return false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the maximum nesting depth of the loop nest rooted by loop \\p Root.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For example given the loop nest:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   for(i)     // loop at level 1 and Root of the nest</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     for(j)   // loop at level 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       &lt;code&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       for(k) // loop at level 3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// getMaxPerfectDepth(Loop&#95;i) would return 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#ad2c7f512c7735232319f74e85a4263e2">getMaxPerfectDepth</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &amp;Root, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Recursivelly traverse all empty &#39;single successor&#39; basic blocks of \\p From</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// (if there are any). When \\p CheckUniquePred is set to true, check if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// each of the empty single successors has a unique predecessor. Return</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// innermost loop, and a nullptr otherwise.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note: the innermost loop returned is not necessarily perfectly nested.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order, therefore if the last 2 loops in it have the same nesting depth</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the loop index of the given loop \\p L.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#aec57833927c1ee7b4ce3c49d3867ee23">getNumLoops</a>(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (L-&gt;getLoopDepth() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Retrieve a vector of perfect loop nests contained in the current loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// nest. For example, given the following  nest containing 4 loops, this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// member function would return &#123;&#123;L1,L2&#125;,&#123;L3,L4&#125;&#125;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   for(i) // L1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     for(j) // L2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       &lt;code&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       for(k) // L3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///         for(l) // L4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;LoopVectorTy, 4&gt;</a> getPerfectLoops(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the loop nest depth (i.e. the loop depth of the &#39;deepest&#39; loop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For example given the loop nest:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   for(i)      // loop at level 1 and Root of the nest</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     for(j1)   // loop at level 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       for(k)  // loop at level 3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     for(j2)   // loop at level 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// getNestDepth() would return 3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a2e412f8b916b22399f515ff64bfb6705"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a2e412f8b916b22399f515ff64bfb6705">getNestDepth</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NestDepth =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a3085b412e1547510b6891a60494b1d14">Loops</a>.back()-&gt;getLoopDepth() - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a3085b412e1547510b6891a60494b1d14">Loops</a>.front()-&gt;getLoopDepth() + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NestDepth &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expecting NestDepth to be at least 1&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NestDepth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the maximum perfect nesting depth.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#acbe3cef3fd28531e0c1e5ae0980e916f"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#acbe3cef3fd28531e0c1e5ae0980e916f">getMaxPerfectDepth</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a8f02315a5f8b586f46e88acdd9d555b4">MaxPerfectDepth</a>; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This analysis provides information for a loop nest. The analysis runs on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">/// demand and can be initiated via AM.getResult&lt;LoopNestAnalysis&gt;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnestanalysis"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnestanalysis">LoopNestAnalysis</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysisinfomixin">AnalysisInfoMixin</a>&lt;LoopNestAnalysis&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">friend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysisinfomixin">AnalysisInfoMixin&lt;LoopNestAnalysis&gt;</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> Key;</Highlight></CodeLine>
